attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: By abolishing the BBC Licence Fee (in effect, a tax), the BBC would then be able to compete equally on a commercial footing with other commercial broadcasters, and not be unfairly subsidised by the tax payer and waste millions of pounds on over-inflated salaries.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
